headline: Iron Mountain Incorporated (IRM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Iron Mountain Incorporated on Stock Analysis Compilation’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on IRM. Iron Mountain Incorporated’s share was trading at $91.49 as of August 15th. IRM’s trailing and forward P/E were 653.50 and 62.50 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
